All Classes and Interfaces|All Packages|Constant Field Values|Serialized Form

P

paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class main.GamePanel
called by the method run, based on the value of the var level calls the draw of title, psswrd, gameOver or the entities linked to that level (so from 1 onwards)
Password - Class in backgrounds
the password screen, its update and draw
Password(GamePanel, GameOver) - Constructor for class backgrounds.Password
assigns the values and loads the sprites
passwordGenerator() - Method in class backgrounds.GameOver
called by player's method update when death, generates random numbers using java.Utils.Random and loads the sprites for those numbers and returns the password
passwordModifier(String) - Method in class backgrounds.Password
called by the update, modifies the number of the password when the arrows on keyboard are pressed
passwordStringIntoImages(String) - Method in class backgrounds.Password
called by player's update method when dies, it converts the password received from the gameOver into images
passwordValid(String) - Method in class backgrounds.GameOver
called by password's method update, checks if the passed password equals the password generated by gameOver's method passwordGenerator and returns a boolean
play() - Method in class main.Sound
starts and loops the sound loaded in "clip"
Player - Class in entities
the bomberman, its update, draw and animation
Player(GamePanel, Stage, KeyHandler, HUD, int, int) - Constructor for class entities.Player
inherits the superconstructor, assign the variables, loads the sprites and creates the bombs and the collider for the player
playMusic(int) - Method in class main.GamePanel
called by setLevel, calls the methods setMusicFile and play of the object "sound" in order to start music
playSE(int) - Method in class main.GamePanel
called by entities, calls the method setFile and playSE of the object "sound", in order to play a sound effect
playSE(int) - Method in class main.Sound
starts the specified sound loaded in "clipList"
plCollisionManager(Collider, Collider, int) - Method in class entities.Entity
called by the collisionManager, calls the player's collider's method checkPlCollision used to check collision based on the situation, manages invulnerability, hits and returns an int linked to the side of impact
plSpeed - Variable in class main.GamePanel
default variable of player stat
plXSize - Variable in class main.GamePanel
default variable of player stat
plYSize - Variable in class main.GamePanel
default variable of player stat
pointer - Variable in class backgrounds.GameOver
image variable
pointer - Variable in class backgrounds.Password
image variable
pointer - Variable in class backgrounds.Title
image variable
powerUp - Variable in class entities.SoftWall
changes the kind of sprite loaded for this softWall
PowerUp - Class in entities
the hidden power ups, their update and draw
PowerUp(GamePanel, HUD, String, int, int, int) - Constructor for class entities.PowerUp
inherits the superconstructor and sets the coordinates, also creates its collider and loads the sprites
powerUpType - Variable in class entities.PowerUp
kind of power up loaded
pressed - Variable in class entities.Entity
activated when a powerUp finds a collision with the player
pressIntervalTimer - Variable in class backgrounds.Password
slows down the input receiving
psswrd - Variable in class backgrounds.GameOver
 
psswrd - Variable in class backgrounds.Password
password shown
psswrd - Variable in class main.GamePanel
 
Puropen - Class in entities
the red helicopter enemies, their update, draw and animation
Puropen(GamePanel, HUD, int, int, int) - Constructor for class entities.Puropen
inherits the superconstructor, loads the sprites and creates its collider and future tomb
pwrUp - Variable in class entities.SoftWall
the hidden power up (null if not hidden)
